articles.author: Tucker Reals
articles.title: Hamas releases video of injured Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin - CBS News
articles.description: A video released by Hamas' military wing appears to show U.S.-Israeli hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin delivering a message under duress.
articles.content: Hamas released a video Wednesday appearing to show one of its Israeli hostages delivering an address in captivity. In the video, a man identifies himself as Israeli-American Hersh Goldberg-Polin befo… [+4631 chars]
